[Ɓe wi'i:] "Ɗum wonaali si wanaa nguurdam amen aduna, meɗen maaya men wuura kadi, menen men wonaali immintinoyteeɓe
Kanko o wonaali si wanaa ko o gorko fefindiiɗo fenaande fawi e Alla, menen non, men wonaali gomɗinayɓe mo
O maaki: "Joom am, wallam e ko ɓe fenni lam kon
O Daali: "Seeɗanii tun, Mi woondii ɓe wontay nimsuɓe
Haacaango ngon nanngi ɓe e Goonga, Men waɗi ɓe duuño, halkaare wonanii yimɓe tooñooɓe ɓen
Refti Men fuɗɗi ɓaawo maɓɓe gire woɓɓe goo
Mofte woo lajal majje ngal adotaako ɗe, ɓe nennantaake kadi
Refti Men Nuli Nulaaɓe Amen ɓen ko ɓe jokkondirɓe, tuma kala ari e mofte Nulaaɗo majje on ɓe fenna mo Men jokkini yoga e maɓɓe yoga, Men waɗi ɓe yewtereeji, woɗɗineede wonanii yimɓe ɓe gomɗintaa ɓen
Refti Men Nuli Muusaa e musiɗɗo makko on Haaruuna wonndude e Aayeeje Amen ɗen e hujja ɓannguɗo
Faade e Fir'awna e mbatu mu'un ngun, ɓe mawnintinii ɓe laatii yimɓe townitiiɓe
Ɓe wi'i: "Enee, hara men gomɗinayyimɓe ɗiɗo yeru amen, hara yimɓe maɓɓe ko maccuɓe amen
Ɓe fenni ɓen ɗiɗo, ɓe laatii jeyaaɓe e halkaaɓe ɓen
Gomɗii Men Okkiino Muusaa Deftere nden belejo'o kamɓe ɓe feewa
Men waɗi geɗal Mariyama on e neene makko Maande, Men werni ɓe faade e tulde joomiraare ñiɓrude e callungol
Ko onon yo Nulaaɓe, ñaamee immorde e laaɓuɗi ɗin gollon ko moƴƴi, pellet Min, Miɗo Anndi ko golloton kon
E pellet, kaa Diina mo'on ko Diina woota, ko Min woni Joomi mo'on hulee Lam
Ɓe taƴi fiyaake maɓɓe on hakkunde maɓɓe dente, kala fedde no farnora ko woni kon ka mayre
Ɗalu ɓe e siwrere nden haa e dummunne
Enee, hara ɓe sikku wonndema ko Men ɓeydiri ɓe kon immorde e jawdi e ɓiɗɓe
Men yaccinanay ɓe e moƴƴereeji, ko woni ɓe so'aa
Pellet, ɓen ɓe kañum immorde e kulol Joomi maɓɓe hara ko ɓe huluɓe
E ɓen ɓe kañum ko ɓe gomɗinɓe Aayeeje Joomi maɓɓe ɗen
E ɓen ɓe kañum ɓe wonah sirkanooɓe Joomi maɓɓe
E ɓen okkayɓe ko ɓe okkaa kon, hara ɓerɗe maɓɓe ɗen ko huluɗe [Alla], wonndema kamɓe ko faade ka Joomi maɓɓe ɓe ruttoytoo
Ɓen [sifaaɓe ɗii sifaaji ɗoo] hiɓe yaccoo e moƴƴereeji ɗin, hara kamɓe ko ɓe adotooɓe e majji
Men fawaali wonkii si wanaa fodde bawɗe makki, no ka Amen Deftere wowlaynde Goonga kan, hara kamɓe ɓe tooñoytaake
Ko woni, ɓerɗe maɓɓe ɗen no e welsungo immorde e ɗum, no woodani ɓe kadi golle gaanin ɗum ko kamɓe gollate ɗe
Haa si Men nanngirii neeminaaɓe maɓɓe ɓen Lepte ɗen jaka yoo kamɓe hiɓe haaca
Wata on haacu hannde, pellet onon, on wallataake immorde e Amen
Gomɗii laatinoke Aayeeje Amen ɗen no janngee e taweede mooɗon, laatiɗon hiɗon ruttoo e dow codduli mooɗon
Ko on mawnintiniiɓe sabu [jeyeede makka] hiɗon hiira wowla bonɗi
Enee, hara ɓe teskaaki konngol ngol, kaa hara aru e maɓɓe ko araali e baabiraaɓe maɓɓe adinooɓe ɓen
Kaa ɓe anndaali Nulaaɗo maɓɓe on, hara kamɓe ko ɓe faytuɓe mo
Kaa hara ɓe wi'ay feetere no e makko? Ko woni, o addanii ɓe Goonga kan ɓurɓe heewude e maɓɓe ko añuɓe Goonga kan
Sinndo Alqur'aana jokkuno beleeɗe maɓɓe ɗen, kammuuli ɗin e leydi ndin bonayno e ɓen wonuɓe e majji, ko woni, Men addaniiɓe waaju maɓɓe ngun, kamɓe koɓe ɗurniiɓe gaayi waaju maɓɓe ngun
Kaa a tori ɓe ngeenaari? [Awa] ko ngeenaari Joomi maaɗa ndin ɓuri moƴƴude, ko Kanko woni Moƴƴo Arsikoowo
Pellet, an hiɗa noddude faade e Laawol Focciingol
E pellet, ɓen ɓe gomɗinaali Laakara on ko ɓe seluɓe e Laawol ngol
Sinndo Men Yurmino ɓe, Men hunci ko heɓi ɓe kon immorde e lorra, ɓe duumotono e nder bewre maɓɓe hiɓe wemmboo
Gomɗii Men nanngirii ɓe Lepte ɗen, ɓe hoykinanaaki Joomi maɓɓe ɓe yankinaaki
Haa si Men udditii e dow maɓɓe dammbugal marungal Lepte saɗtuɗe, e jaka, kamɓe e nder ɗum ko ɓe taƴii ɓe
Ko Kanko woni On fuɗɗanƊo on nanɗe ɗen e giiɗe ɗen e ɓerɗe ɗen, fanɗii ko yettoton
Ko Kanko woni On TaguƊo on ka leydi ko faade ka Makko mooɓoyteɗon
Ko Kanko woni On Mo no wurna O wara no woodani Mo luutindirgol jemma on e ñalorma on, enee, kaa on hakkiltah
Ko woni, ɓe wi'u yeru ko aramɓe ɓen wi'unoo kon
Ɓe wi'i: "Enee, si men maayii men wonii mbullaari e ƴi'e, hara menen ko men immintinoyteeɓe
Gomɗii men fodanooma ɗum menen e baabiraaɓe amen ko adii, ɗum wonaali si wanaa tinndi adinooɓe
Maaku: "Ko hommbo leydi ndin woodani e ɓen wonuɓe e mayri, si tawii hiɗon anndi
Aray ɓe wi'a: "Ko Alla woodani" maaku: "Enee, on waajitotaako
Maaku: "Ko hommbo woni Jom kammuuli ɗin jeeɗiɗi e Jom Arsi mawki kin?" @Corrected
Aray ɓe wi'a: "Ko Alla" maaku: "Enee, on hulatah [Alla]
Maaku hommbo woni e Junngo Mu'un Laamu kala huunde hara Kanko hiMo walla O walletaake, si tawii on laatike hiɗon anndi
Aray ɓe wi'a: "Ko Alla woodani" maaku: "Enee, ko honno mbilirteɗon
Ko woni, Men addanii ɓe Goonga kan, pellet kamɓe ko ɓe fenuɓe

Alla jogitaaki ɓiɗɗo, reweteeɗo laataaki wonndude e Makko, e jaka [si waɗum waɗuno] kala reweteeɗo yaadayno e ko o tagi kon, yoga e maɓɓe townitotono e dow yoga. Senayee wonanii Alla e gaayi kon ko ɓe sifotoo
Annduɗo ko wirnii kon e ko seedaa kon O Toowii e gaayi ko ɓe sirkata kon
Maaku: "Jooma am si A hollii lam ko ɓe fodaa kon
Jooma am, wata A waɗam e yimɓe tooñooɓe ɓen
Pellet, Menen fii yo Men holle ko Men fodi ɓe kon ko Men Hattanɓe [ɗum]
Duñir nden huunde ɓurnde moƴƴude [huunde] bonunde nden, ko Menen Anndi ko ɓe sifoto kon
Maaku: "Jooma, mi moolorii Ma immorde e kodooje Seytanuuji ɗin
Mi moolorii Ma Jooma am nde ɗi tawata lam
Haa si maayde arii e goɗɗo e maɓɓe nden, o wi'a: "Jooma am ruttee lam
Belajo'o men, mi gollay ko moƴƴi e nder kon ko mi accunoo, ɗum waɗataa, ngol ko kanngol ko kanko wowli ngol, no hedde ɓaawo maɓɓe heedo haa Ñalnde nde ɓe imminoytee
Si wuttaama ka alaadu, haray askaaji alah hakkunde maɓɓe nden Ñalnde, ɓe lanndandirtah
Kala on mo jisti(teddi) manndake (peesirgal)muuɗum, haray ko ɓen ɗon woni maloyteeɓe ɓen
Kala mo manndake [moƴƴi] muuɗum foygitii, (hoyi)haray ko ɓen ɗon woni hayruɓe pittaali muuɗum, ko ka nder Jahannama woni ko ɓe luttintee
Yiite ngen no sunna geece maɓɓe ɗen, hara kamɓe e nder magge ko ɓe ñirɓiniiɓe
Enee, hara Aayeeje Am ɗen laataaki no janngee e taweede mo'on, laatiɗon hiɗon fenna ɗe
Ɓe wi'i: "Joomi amen, ko malkiso amen ngon foolii men, men laatinoke yimɓe majjuɓe
Joomi amen, yaltin men e magge, si men ruttike hara pellet, menen ko men tooñuɓe
O Daala: "Ñiiɓee e nder magge wata on haalanam
Pellet, laatinoke fedde e jeyaaɓe Am ɓen hiɓe wi'a: "Joomi amen, men gomɗinii haforan men YurmeƊaa men ko An ɓuri Moƴƴude Yurmeteeɓe ɓen
Jogitiɗon ɓe jalnori(jalkigol), haa ɓe yejjintini on jaŋta Am, laatiɗon hiɗon jala ɓe
Min Mi yoɓii ɓe hannde sabu ko ɓe muññinoo kon, pellet, kamɓe ko kamɓe woni malaaɓe ɓen
O Daali: "No foti heewde ko ñiiɓuɗon ka leydi, limoore duuɓi
Ɓe wi'i: "Men ñiiɓii ñallal maaɗum yoga e ñallal, lanndo limooɓe ɓen
O Daali: "On ñiiɓaali si wonaa seeɗa, sinndo onon on laatino hiɗon anndi
Enee, on sikku wonndema ko Men Tagiri on ko puyndan, hara onon on ruttetaake faade ka Amen
Alla Toowii Laamɗo Goonguɗo On, Rewetee- ɗo alah si wanaa Kanko Jooma Arsi Tedduki kin. @Corrected
Kala nodduɗo wonndude e Alla reweteeɗo goo, daliil alanah mo e ɗum, anndu pellet, hasboo- re makko ko ka Joomi makko, pellet Kanko, O malnatah heeferɓe ɓen
Maaku: "Jooma am, Yaafo Yurmo ko An Ɓuri Moƴƴude Yurmeteeɓe ɓen
Simoore, Men jippinii nde Men farlii nde, Men jippini e nder mayre Aayeeje ɓannguɗe belajo'o onon on waajitoto

Debbo jinoowo on e gorko jeenoowo on foccee gooto kala e maɓɓe paatawol(looci) teemedere, wata yurmeende maɓɓe nanngu on e fii Diina Alla kan, si tawii on laatike hiɗon gomɗini Alla e Ñalaande Laakara nden. Yo seedo foccugol ɓe ngol jamaa immorde e gomɗinɓe ɓen
Gorko jinoowo on o resataa si wonaa debbo jeenoowo maaɗum sirkoowo, debbo jinoowo on resatah mo si wanaa gorko jinoowo maaɗum sirkoowo, ɗum harminaama e dow gomɗinɓe ɓen
E ɓen ɓe no tukka rewɓe saŋiiɓe ɓen refti hara ɓe addaali seedeeɓe nayo, haray piyee ɓe paatawol(looci) cappanɗe jeetati. Wata on jaɓan ɓe seedagol poomaa. Ɓen ɗon, ko kamɓe woni Faasiqiiɓe ɓen
Si wanaa ɓen tuubuɓe ɓaawo ɗum ɓe moƴƴini. Pellet, Alla ko O Surroowo Yurmeteeɗo
E ɓen ɓe no tukka sonnaaɓe maɓɓe ɓen hara laatanaaki ɓe seedeeɓe si wanaa wonkiiji maɓɓe ɗin, ko yo goɗɗo e maɓɓe seedo seedeeji nayi [o woondira] Alla pellet, kanko ko e goonguɓe ɓen o jeyaa
Jowaɓun ɗum, wonndema yo kuddi Alla wonu e dow makko si o laatike jeyaaɗo e fenooɓe ɓen
Ɓe dunyira e [sonnaajo on] lepte ɗen, nde o seedotoo seedeeji nayi [o woondira] Alla, pellet [gorko on] ko e fenooɓe ɓen o jeyaa
Jowaɓun ɗum, ko nde Alla tikkata e dow makko si [gorko on] laatike ko e goonguɓe ɓen o jeyaa
Sinndo wanaano Ɓural Alla ngal e dow mooɗon e Yurmeende Makko nden, e wonndema Alla ko O jaɓoowo tuubuubuye Ñeeñuɗo

Pellet, ɓen adduɓe penaale ɗen ko ɓe jamaa jeyaaɗo e mooɗon, wata on sikku ɗum ko bone mo'on; ko woni ɗum ko moƴƴere mo'on. No woodani kala neɗɗo immorde e maɓɓe ko o faggitii kon e junuubu, on fawtiiɗo mawɗum [junuubu on] immorde e maɓɓe, no woodani mo Lepte mawɗe
Ko haanunoo tuma nde nanuɗon ɗum, worɓe gomɗinɓe ɓen e rewɓe gomɗinɓe ɓen ɓe yananee ka wonkiiji maɓɓe ko moƴƴi, ɓe wi'a: "Ɗum ko penaale ɓannguɗe nii
Ko haanunoo ko nde ɓe addata e ɗum seedeeɓe nayo, si ɓe addaali seedeeɓe ɓen; haray ɓen ɗon, ka Alla ko kamɓe woni fenooɓe ɓen
Sinndo wonaano Ɓural Alla ngal e Yurmeende Makko nden e dow mooɗon ka aduna e ka laakara Lepte mawɗe meemayno on fii kon ko ukkiɗon e muuɗum
Tuma nde werloraynoɗon ɗum ɗennɗe mooɗon, wowliron kunnduɗe mooɗon kon ko ganndal alanah on e muuɗum sikkon ɗum kadi ko newiiɗum, hara non ɗum ko mawnuɗom ka Alla
Ko haanunoo tuma nanuɗon nde, wi'on: "Haanaa men nde men wowlata e dum, Senayee woodanii Ma, ɗum ko fenaande mawnde nii
Alla no waajaade on fii wata on fillo sugu [ndee fenaande] poomaa, si tawii on laatike gomɗinɓe
Alla no ɓannginannde on Aayeeje ɗen Alla ko O Annduɗo Ñeeñuɗo
Pellet, ɓen yiɗuɓe yo bone ɗen saako e [hoore] ɓen gomɗinɓe; no woodani ɓe Lepte muusuɗe ka aduna e ka Laakara. Alla no Anndi, onon on anndah
Sinndo wanaano Ɓural Alla ngal e dow mooɗon e Yurmeende Makko nden e tawde pellet, Alla ko O Newiiɗo Hinndotooao

Ko onon ɓen gomɗinɓe, wata on jokku ɗate Seytaane ɗen, kala jokkuɗo ɗate Seytaane ɗen, pellet, o yamiray [mo] ko boni kon e ko añaa kon. Sinndo wonaano Ɓural Alla ngal e dow mooɗon e Yurmeende Makko nden; hay e gooto e mooɗon laaɓataano poomaa, kono Alla hiMo laɓɓina on mo O Muuyi. Alla ko O Nanoowo Annduɗo

Wata joomiraaɓe ɓural ngal e yaajeende nden e mooɗon woondu wonndema ɓe okkortaa ɓadondiraaɓe ɓen e ɓilliiɓe ɓen e feruɓe ɓen ka Laawol Alla, yo ɓe yaafo. Kaa on yiɗaa yo Alla yawtan on? Alla ko O Yawtoowo Yurmeteeɗo
Pellet, ɓen wonuɓe tukkude [sonnaaɓe] saŋiiɓe welsindiiɓe gomɗinɓe, ɓe huɗaama ka aduna e ka Laakara no woodani ɓe Lepte mawɗe
Ñalnde seedoytoo e dow maɓɓe ɗenɗe maɓɓe ɗen e juuɗe maɓɓe ɗen e koyɗe maɓɓe ɗen, ko ɓe laatinoo kon hiɓe golla
Nden Ñalnde Alla huuɓinanay ɓe [njoɓdi] Diina maɓɓe Goongaha kan, ɓe annda pellet, Alla ko Kanko woni Goonga Ɓannguka kan

Rewɓe soɓuɓe ɓen ko fii worɓe soɓuɓe ɓen. Worɓe soɓuɓe ɓen ko fii rewɓe soɓuɓe ɓen. Rewɓe laaɓuɓe ɓen ko fii worɓe laaɓuɓe ɓen, worɓe laaɓuɓe ɓen ko fii rewɓe laaɓuɓe ɓen. Ɓee ɗoo ko hisnaaɓe e kon ko ɓe wowlata, no woodani ɓe haforaneede e arsike tedduɗo
Ko onon yo gomɗinɓe, wata on naatu e cuuɗi tanaa cuuɗi mo'on ɗin haa duŋinoɗon salminon e dow yimɓe majji ɓen, ko ɗum ɓuri moƴƴannde on. Bela jo'o onon on waajitoto
Si on tawaali nder ton goɗɗo, wata on naatu ton haa duŋaneɗon, si on wi'aama: "Yiltee" haray yiltee, ko ɗum ɓuri laaɓannde on. Alla non hiMo Anndi ko golloton kon
Bakkaatu fawaaki on nde naatoton e cuuɗi ɗi hoɗiraaka hara no e nder majji miranhoy mo'on, Alla non hiMo Anndi ko wonɗon e feññinde e ko wonɗon e suuɗude
Maakan worɓe gomɗinɓe ɓen yo ɓe heltu ndarɗe maɓɓe ɗen ɓe reena farjuuji maɓɓe ɗin, ko ɗum ɓurata laɓɓinnde ɓe. Pellet, Alla ko O Humpitiiɗo ko ɓe huuwata

Maakan rewɓe gomɗinɓe ɓen yo ɓe heltu ndarɗe maɓɓe ɗen, ɓe reena farjuuji maɓɓe ɗin, wata ɓe feññin cuɗaari maɓɓe ndin si wanaa ko feeñi kon e mayri. Yo ɓe fawu tiggaaje maɓɓe ɗen ka becce maɓɓe, wata ɓe feññinan cuɗaari maɓɓe ndin si wanaa genndiraaɓe maɓɓe ɓen maaɗum baabiraaɓe maɓɓe maaɗum baabiraaɓe genndiraaɓe maɓɓe maaɗum ɓiɗɓe maɓɓe, maaɗum ɓiɗɓe genndiraaɓe maɓɓe maaɗum musiɗɓe maɓɓe, maaɗum ɓiɗɓe musiɗɓe maɓɓe, maaɗum ɓiɗɓe banndiraaɓe maɓɓe, maaɗum sonnaaɓe maɓɓe, maaɗum ɓen ɓe ɓe jeyiri ñaame maɓɓe maaɗum ɓen worɓe jokkooɓe ɓe haaju mun alaa e rewɓe, maaɗum boobo mo ƴellitaaki e awraaji sonnaaɓe ɓen. Wata ɓe tappindir koyɗe maɓɓe ɗen fii yo Annde ko ɓe suuɗi kon immorde e cuɗaari maɓɓe. Tuubee ruttoɗon ka Alla on fow mo'on, ko onon yo gomɗinɓe bela jo'o on malete
Resinee ɓe resaali ɓen e mooɗon e moƴƴuɓe ɓen immorde e muccuɓe mooɗon e horɓe mooɗon, si ɓe laatike waasuɓe Alla alɗinay ɓe immorde e Ɓural Makko ngal, Alla ko O Yaajuɗo Annduɗo

Ɓe heɓaali feere resugol ɓen yo ɓe habbo haa Alla alɗinira ɓe Ɓural Makko ngal. Ɓen wonuɓe ɗaɓɓude soottaade e ɓen ɓe ñaame mooɗon jeyi, soottaadede ɓe si on anndii e maɓɓe moƴƴere, jonnee ɓe immorde e jawdi Alla ndin, ndin ndi O jonni on, wata on waawnu horɓe mooɗon ɓen e fii jeeno, si ɓe faandike saŋaade, wata on ɗaɓɓu jawkal ngurndam aduna, kala waawnuuɗo ɓe pellet, Alla ɓaawo baawnugol ɓe ko O Surroowo Yurmiteeɗo
Gomɗii Men jippinii e mooɗon Aayeeje ɓannguɗe e misal immorde e ɓeya wulinooɓe ko adii on e waaju wonannde hulooɓe [Alla] ɓen

Ko Alla woni Ndaygu kammuuli ɗin e leydi ndin, sifa Ndaygu Makko ngun ko wano tuɗɗere hara no e mayre pitilol(lampu), pitilol ngol wona e nder biiniiri, biiniiri ndin hara hindi wa'i wa hoodere jalbunde hinde huɓɓa immorde e leggal barkinaangal nebbantewal ngal wonaa funnaangeyankowal ngal wonaa hirnaangeyankowal nebban maggal ɗan no ɓadoo jalbude, hay si yiite meemaali ɗan, ndaygu e hoore ndaygu, Alla no fewnira ndaygu Makko ngun on mo O Muuyi, Alla no piyana yimɓe ɓen mise, Alla ko O Annduɗo kala huunde. @Corrected
E nder cuuɗi ɗi Alla duŋii(sakkiti) yo darne Innde Makko jantee e nder majji Subunhinanee Mo nder majji ka bimmbi e ka kiikiiɗe
Worɓe ɓe njulaaku e ngeyngu maapintaa ɗum gaayi jaŋtagol Alla e ñimnugol Julde nden e tottu- gol Jakka on, hiɓe huli Ñalaande nde waylitoytoo e muuɗum ɓerɗe ɗen e giiɗe ɗen
Fii yo Alla yoɓoyɓe ko ɓuri moƴƴude ko ɓe gollunoo kon, O ɓeydana ɓe e Ɓural Makko ngal. Alla no arsika on mo O Muuyi ko Aldaa hasboore

Ɓen yedduɓe, golle maɓɓe ɗen no wa'i wa merere wonunde e boowal, ɗonɗaaɗo on no sikka ko nde ndiyam, haa si o arii e mayre o tawataa hay e huunde, o tawa Alla ka Makko O huuɓinana mo hasboore makko nden, Alla ko O Yaawuɗo Hasboore. @Corrected

Maaɗum ko wano niɓe e maayo luggungo, no suddi ngo benpeƴƴe no dow maggo benpeƴƴe no dow majje duule, niɓe yoga e majje no e dow yoga, si o yaltinii junngo makko ngon o ɓadotaako yi'ugol ngo. On mo Alla waɗanaali ndaygu hara o alaa ndaygu

Enee, a yi'aali wonndema Alla no subuhinanaade Mo ɓen wonuɓe ka kammuuli e ka leydi e colli ɗin kadi ko saffiniiɗi? Gooto kala e ɗii gomɗii anndii julde mu'un nden e subuhinaali mu'un ɗin, Alla ko O Annduɗo ko ɓe Huuwata
Ko Alla heeranii Laamu kammuuli ɗin e leydi ndin, ko faade ka Alla woni waɗtinirde nden

Enee, a yi'aali wonndema Alla hiMo sogga duulere, refti O hawtindira nde, refti O waɗa nde fawondirnde hiɗa yi'a toɓo ngon no yalta e nder mayre, ngo jippoo immorde ka kammu, immorde e pelle no e nder mayre marmalle hiMo hewtina ɗe on mo O Muuyi, hiMo pottina ɗe on mo O Muuyi? Ndaneeri maƴe mayre no do'a naɓude giiɗe ɗen
Alla hiMo waylita jemma on e ñalorma on, pellet, na wonii e ɗum tasakuyee wonannde joomiraaɓe giiɗe ɓen

Ko Alla tagii kala daabe hun immorde e ndiyam, no e majji yaarooji reedu muuɗum, no e majji yaarooji koyɗe muuɗm no e majji kadi yaarooji [koyɗe] nayi. Alla hiMo Taga ko O Muuyi, pellet, Alla ko O hattanɗo kala huunde
Gomɗii Men jippinii Aayeeje ɓannguɗe, Alla no fewna on mo O muuyii faade e Laawol foccii ngol
Hiɓe wi'a: "Men gomɗinii Alla e Nulaaɗo on, men ɗoftike, refti huccita fedde goo e maɓɓe, ɓaawo ɗum, ɓen wonaali gomɗinɓe
Si ɓe noddaama faade ka Alla e Nulaaɗo Makko on fii yo o ñaawu hakkunde maɓɓe, tawa fedde goo e maɓɓe ko ɓe ɗuurniiɓe
Si tawii ko kamɓe mari goonga kan, ɓe aray ka makko ko ɓe ɗoftiiɓe
Enee, ko nawnaare woni ka ɓerɗe maɓɓe, kaa ɓe sikkiti, kaa ɓe hulu wata Alla e Nulaaɗo Makko on tooñu ɓe? Ko woni, ɓee ko kamɓe woni tooñooɓe ɓen
Anndu ko woni konngol gomɗinɓe ɓen si ɓe noddaama faade ka Alla e Nulaaɗo Makko on fii yo o ñaawu hakkunde maɓɓe, ko nde ɓe wi'ata: "Men nanii men ɗoftike." Ɓen ɗon ko kamɓe woni malaaɓe ɓen
Kala ɗoftiiɗo Alla e Nulaaɗo Makko on o huli Alla o rentii [e Lepte Makko ɗen] haray ɓen ɗon ko kamɓe woni malaaɓe ɓen
Ɓe woondiri Alla, e hattirde goondooje maɓɓe, si a yamirii ɓe ma ɓe yaltu sanne. Maaku: "wata on woondu, ɗoftaare no anndaa, pellet, Alla ko humpitiiɗo ko golloton

Maaku: "Ɗoftee Alla ɗoftoɗon Nulaaɗo on". Si ɓe huccitii(runtiima) anndu ko fawii mo ko, ko o roondaa kon, no fawii on ko roonda ɗon kon, si on ɗoftike mo on feeway, fawaaki Nulaaɗo on si wanaa yottinngol ɓanngungol

Alla Fodii ɓen gomɗinɓe e mooɗon ɓe golli moƴƴi ɗin O lontinay ɓe ka leydi wano O lontinirnoo non ɓen adiiɓe ɓe, ma O weeɓinan ɓe diina maɓɓe ka O welanaa ɓe, ma O wattitan ɓe ɓaawo kulol maɓɓe ngol hoolaare, Yo ɓe rewam wata ɓe sirkanam hay e huunde. Kala yedduɗo ɓaawo ɗum haray ɓen ɗon ko kamɓe woni faasiqiiɓe ɓen
Ñiiɓee e Julde totton Jakka on ɗoftoɗon kadi Nulaaɗo on, bela jo'o on Yurmete
Wata a sikku ɓeen yedduɓe ɓe laawoto ka leydi, jaaƴorde maɓɓe nden ko ka Yiite, pellet, bonii wattnde

Ko onon yo gomɗinɓe, yo sakkintino e mooɗon ɓen ɓe ñaame mooɗon jeyi, e ɓen ɓe yottaaki koyɗol immorde e mooɗon, laabi tati ko adii Julde Peeral nden, e tuma wallinton conci mooɗon ka njolloro e ka ɓaawo Julde geeƴe ko awraaji mooɗon tati non. Bakkaatu fawaaki on fawaaki ɓe ɓaawo majji, jinndooɓe hakkunde mooɗon, yoga e mooɗon e dow yoga. Ko wano nii Alla ɓanngini- rani on Aayeeje ɗen Alla ko O Annduɗo Ñeeñuɗo
Si sukaaɓe mooɗon yottike kellefuyee, yo ɓe sakkitinono wano duŋinornoo non ɓen adiiɓe ɓe, ko wano nii Alla ɓannginiranta on Aayeeje Makko ɗen, Alla ko O Annduɗo Ñeeñuɗo
E sonnaaɓe jottiiɓe ɓen, ɓen ɓe jortaaki desal bakkaatu fawaaki ɓe nde ɓe wallinta conci maɓɓe ɗin hara ɓe wonaa feññinɓe cuɗaari, ko nde ɓe nantotoo ɓuri moƴƴannde ɓe, Alla ko O Nanoowo Annduɗo

Bakkaatu fawaaki bunɗu on, bakkaatu fawaaki laƴuɗo on, bakkaatu fawaaki nawnuɗo on, fawaaki e wonkiiji mooɗon nde ñaamoton ka cuuɗi mooɗon maaɗum ka cuuɗi baabiraaɓe mooɗon, maaɗum ka cuuɗi neeniraaɓe mooɗon, maaɗum ka cuuɗi musiɗɓe mooɗon, maaɗum ka cuuɗi banndiraaɓe mooɗon, maaɗum ka cuuɗi bappiraaɓe mooɗon, maaɗum ka cuuɗi yaayiraaɓe mooɗon, maaɗom ka cuuɗi kaawiraaɓe mooɗon, maaɗum ka cuuɗi neeniraaɓe mooɗon ka dewol, maaɗum ɗin ɗi jogiɗon cottirɗe muuɗum, maaɗum giɗo mooɗon. Bakkaatu fawaaki on nde hawtoton ñaamon maaɗum ñaamon ko on sertuɓe. Si on naatay e cuuɗi salminee e dow wonkiiji mooɗon, hiwraango immorde ka Alla barkinaango laaɓungo, ko wano nii Alla ɓannguniranta on Aayeeje ɗen belajo'o onon on haqqilay

Anndu gomɗinɓe ɓen ko ɓen gomɗinɓe Alla e Nulaaɗo Makko on, si ɓe laatike hiɓe wonndi e makko e dow fiyaake moftuɗo, ɓe yahatah haa ɓe duŋinoo e makko, pellet, ɓen ɗaɓɓirayɓe ma duŋayee ko ɓen ɗon woni gomɗinɓe Alla e Nulaaɗo Makko on, si ɓe ɗaɓɓirii ma duŋayee fii yoga e fiyaake maɓɓe, duŋano on mo yiɗuɗaa [duŋanaade] e maɓɓe, insinanoɗaa ɓe ka Alla. Pellet, Alla ko O Surroowo Yurmeteeɗo

Wata on waɗu noddugol Nulaaɗo on hakkunde mooɗon wano noddugol yoga e mooɗon yoga. Gomɗii Alla no Anndi ɓen sortotooɓe e mooɗon e moltagol, ɓen wonuɓe lunndaade yamaruyee makko on, yo ɓe rento fii wata fitina hiɓu ɓe maaɗum Lempte muusuɗe heɓa ɓe

Ko non woniri, pellet, ko Alla heeranii ko woni kon ka kammuuli e ka leydi gomɗii hiMo Anndi ko wonuɗon e hoore mu'un kon, Ñalnde ɓe ruttetee faade ka Makko O yeetoo ɓe ko ɓe gollunoo kon. Alla ko O Annduɗo kala huunde
Mawnii On Jippinɗo Serndoore nden e dow jeyaaɗo Makko on fii yo wonan winndire nden jertinoowo
On Mo woodanii ɗum Laamu kammuuli ɗin e leydi ndin, o jogitaaki ɓiɗɗo laatanaaki Mo kadi kafidaaɗo ka Laamu. O tagii kala huunde O eɓɓindiinde e eɓɓugol
Ɓe jogitii gaanin Makko reweteeɗi ɗi tagaani huunde kannji ko ɗi tagaaɗi, ɗi maranah ko'e majji lorra wanaa nafa ɗi marah mayde wanaa ngurndan wanaa Immital
Ɓen yedduɓe wi'i: "Ndee [Alqur'aanaare] wonaali si wonah pene ɗi o fefindii ɗum, walli mo e hoore majje yimɓe goo". Gomɗii ɓe addii tooñe e bagamma
Ɓe wi'i: "Ko nde tinndi adinooɓe o winnditi ɗi hiɗi fidanee mo bimmbi e kiikiiɗe
Maaku: "Jippinii nde On Annduɗo ngunndoo on ka kammuuli e ka leydi, pellet, Kanko O Laatike Surroowo Yurmeteeɗo
Ɓe wi'i: "Ko heɓi oo Nulaaɗo, himo ñaama ñaametee himo yaha kadi ka lokooji(jeereeji)°? Ko haanunoo ko nde jippintee e makko Maalaa'ikaajo o laatoo wonndude e makko jertinoowo
Maaɗum werlee e makko ngalu, maaɗum laatanoo mo ngesa o ñaama e mabba. Tooñooɓe ɓen wi'i: "On jokkaali si wonaa gorko mbilɗaaɗo
Ndaarii [yo Nulaaɗo] ko honno ɓe piyiranay maa mise, ɓe majjii ɓe hattantaake [heɓude] laawol
Mawnii On tawɗo si O Muuyii O waɗane moƴƴere, no e ɗum gese no ila ley majje canɗe ɗen, O waɗane kadi kuɓeeje
Ko woni, ɓe fennu Darngo ngo, Men heblorani ɓen fennuɓe Darngal ngal Yiite ooyunge
Si nge yi'ii ɓe immorde e nokkuure woɗɗunde nananee nge tikkere e faraango
Si ɓe werlaama e nder magge e nokkuure ɓittunde ko ɓe sinndindiraaɓe, ɓe nodda ton halakuyee
Wata on noddu hannde halakuyee gooto, noddee halakuyeeji buy
Maaku: "Enee, ko ɗum ɓuri moƴƴude, kaa ko Aljanna luttoowo on, on mo hulooɓe Alla ɓen fodaa? O laatanike ɓe njoɓdi e wattinirde
No woodani ɓe nder ton ko ɓe welaa, ko ɓe ñiiɓooɓe, ɗum laatike e dow Joomi maaɗa Fodoore lannditeteende
Ñalnde O mooɓidoyta ɓe e ko ɓe rewaynoo kon gaanin Alla, O Daala: "Enee, ko onon majjini ɓee jeyaaɓe Am, kaa ko kamɓe majji Laawol ngol
Ɗi wi'a: "Senayee wonanii Ma, haananah men nde men jogitotoo gaanin Maaɗa immorde e reweteeɓe, kono, A dakmintinii ɓe e baabiraaɓe maɓɓe ɓen haa ɓe yejjiti waaju ngun ɓe laatii yimɓe halkiiɓe
Gomɗii ɓe fennii on, sabu ko wi'oton kon, ɓe hattantah yiltugol [Lepte ɗen] wanaa wallude, kala tooñuɗo e mooɗon Men meeɗinay mo Lepte mawɗe
Men Nulaali ado maaɗa immorde e Nulaaɓe si wanaa kamɓe hiɓe nafoo ñaametee hiɓe seenoo kadi ka luumaaji, Men waɗi yoga e mooɗon fitina yoga, fii yo on muñño. Joomi maaɗa laatike ko O Yi'oowo
Ɓen ɓe jortaaki hawroyde e Amen wi'i: "Ko hannoo jippinee e makko Malaa'ikaaɓe ɓen, maaɗum men yi'a Joomi amen?" Gomɗii ɓee mawnintinike ka wonkiiji maɓɓe, ɓe townitii townitaare mawnunde
Ñalnde ɓe yi'oyta Malaa'ikaaɓe ɓen weltaare alanaa bomɓe ɓen nden Ñalnde, ɓe wi'a: "Heedo heedaango
Men ardini faade e ko ɓe gollunoo kon immorde e gollal, Men waɗi ngal punndi caraandi
Yimɓe Aljanna ɓen nden Ñalnde ɓuri moƴƴude ñiiɓirde ɓuri labeede kadi ñallirde
E Ñalnde nde kummu ngun seekorta duule ɗen Malaa'ikaaɓe ɓen jippinee jippineede
Laamu GoongAawu ngun nden Ñalnde ko Hinnorante On ngu woodani, laatoo Ñalnde saɗtunde e dow yedduɓe ɓen
E Ñalnde tooñuɗo on ŋatoyta junngo makko ngon, o wi'a: "Eeh jalla min, mi jogitino wonndude e Nulaaɗo on Laawol
Eeh bone am haaniino min, mi jogitanooki kaariijo sehilaajo
Gomɗii o majjinii lam gaayi Deftere nden ɓaawo nde arii a am, Seytaane laatike ko o jaasinoowo neɗɗanke on
Nulaaɗo on maaka: "Ko ann yo Jooma pellet, yimɓe am ɓen ɓe jogitike ndee Alqur'aanaare wikkaande(accaande)
Ko wano nii, Men waɗirani kala Annabaajo gaño immorde e bonɓe ɓen, Joomi maaɗa yonii Fewnoowo e Ballo
Ɓen yedduɓe wi'i: "Ko hanno Alqur'aanaare nden jippinee e makko e jumla gooto?" Ɗum ko wano nii, fii yo Men tabintinir nde ɓernde maaɗa nden Men rewnindira nde rewnindirgol
Ɓe addantaa ma misal, si wanaa Men addanii ma Goonga kan e ko ɓuri moƴƴude firo
Ɓen mooɓoyteeɓe e dow geece muuɗum faade ka Jahannama, ko ɓen ɗon woni ɓuruɓe bonde nokkuure e ɓuruɓe majjude kade laawol
Gomɗii Men okkii Muusaa Deftere nden, Men waɗi wonndude e makko Musiɗɗo makko on Haaruuna ballo
Men Daali: "Yahee ka ɓen yimɓe fennuɓe Aayeeje Amen ɗen, Men yirbini ɓe yirbinndee
E yimɓe Nuuhu tuma nde ɓe fennunoo Nulaaɓe ɓen, Men yooli ɓe Men waɗi ɓe maande fii yimɓe ɓen, Men heblani tooñooɓe ɓen Lepte muusuɗe
E Aadinkooɓe ɓen e Samuudinkooɓe ɓen e yimɓe ɓunndu ndun e gire ɗuuɗuɗe hakkunde ɗum
Gooto kala e maɓe Men piyani ɗum mise, gooto kala e maɓɓe men halki ɗum halkugol
Gomɗii ɓe arii e nden saare toɓaande toɓo bonngo. Kaa ɓe laataaki hiɓe yi'a ɗe? Ko woni, ɓe laatinoke ɓe jortaaki Immotal
Si ɓe yi'ii ma, ɓe jogitotaako ma si wanaa jalnori. Enee, ko oo Alla Immini Nulaaɗo
Fii kala hari o ɓadike(ɗesi) majjinnde en gaayi reweteeɗi me'en ɗin si tawiino wanaa ko muññi ɗen kon e dow majji. Aray ɓe anndoyat tuma ɓe yi'ata Lepte ɗen ko hommbo ɓurɗo majjude laawol
Enee, a tinii on jogitiiɗo reweteeɗo makko on beleeɗe makko ɗen. E hara ko an laatotoo e dow makko fawtiiɗo
Kaa a sikku wonnde ko ɓuri heewude e maɓɓe hiɓe nana maaɗum hiɓe hakkila? Anndu kamɓe ɓe wonaali si wanaa wano neemoraaɗi, toode, ko kamɓe ɓuri majjude laawol
Kaa a tinaali faade e Joomi maaɗa honno O fontiri ɗowdi ndin? Sinndo O Muuyuno O waɗayno ndi deeƴundi, refti Men waɗi naange ngen tinndinaynge e mayri
Refti Men tami ndi ka Amen tamannde newiinde
Ko Kanko woni On waɗanɗo on jemma on koltu e ɗoyngol ngol fowtere, O waɗi ñalorma on ngal saakorɗo
Ko Kanko woni On accituɗo keni ɗin ko ɗi weltinooji hakkunde Yurmeende Makko nden, Men jippini immorde ka kammu ndiyam laaɓuɗam
Fii yo Men wurnitir ɗam leydi maayundi, Men yarnaɗam kadi kon ko Men tagi neemoraaɗi e yimɓe ɗuuɗuɓe
Gomɗii Men fensitii nde hakkunde maɓɓe fii yo ɓe waajito, salii ɓurɓe ɗuuɗude e yimɓe ɓen si wanaa yeddugol
Sinndo Men Muuyuno Men Nulayno e kala saare jertinoowo
Wata a ɗofto yedduɓe ɓen haɓ e maɓɓe hare jihaadi mawnde
Ko Kanko woni On jillindirɗo maaje ɗen ɗiɗi, ngooɗoo ko welungo ƴem ngooɗoo kadi ko lamɗamwo haaɗungo tak, O waɗi wirngallo hakkunde majje, e heedo heedaango
Ko Kanko woni on Taguɗo ɓanndunke immorde e ndiyam ɗam, O waɗi mo dammbe e esiraawo, Joomi maaɗa laatike ko O Hattanɗo
Hiɓe rewa gaanin Alla kon ko nafataa ɓe lorrataa ɓe, yedduɗo on laatike ko o teeɗiiɗo Joomi makko
Men Nuliraali ma si wanaa ko a weltinoowo e jartinoowo
Maaku: "Mi naamaaki on e dow ɗum njoɓdi si wanaa on yiɗuɗo jogitaade faade ka Joomi makko Laawol
Wakkilo e On Wuuruɗo Mo maayataa subuhinoɗaa wonndunde e yettugol Mo, O yonii e ɗum Humpitiiɗo junubaaji jeyaaɓe Makko
On Taguɗo kammuuli ɗin e leydi ndin e ko woni kon hakkunde majji, e nder balɗe jeego'o refti O fotondiri ka dow Arsi, Hinnorante On lanndo Mo ko O Humpitiiɗo. @Corrected
Si wi'anaama ɓe: "Sujjanee Hinnorante On" Ɓe wi"a: "Ko hommbo woni Hinnorante On? Enee, hara men sujjanay kon ko yamirɗaa men?" Ɗum ɓeydi ɓe foɗɗitaare
Mawnii On waɗuɗo ka kammu burjuuji(buurti) o waɗi e nder majji pitilol e leelewal jalbungal
Ko Kanko woni On waɗuɗo jemma on e ñalorma on lontondirayɗi fii on faandiiɗo annditugol maaɗum o faandii jarnugol
E jeyaaɓe Hinnorante On, ɓen yahooɓe ka leydi ko no newiri, si majjuɓe ɓen ewnike ɓe, ɓe wi'a: "Kisiyee". @Corrected
E ɓen waalooɓe sujjannde Joomi maɓɓe e daragol [juula]
E ɓen wi'ooɓe: "Joomi amen woɗɗintinan men Lepte Jahannama ɗen, pellet, Lepte magge ɗen ko duumiiɗe
Pellet, ɗen bonii ñiiɓirde e darorde
E ɓen tawɓe si ɓe nafkii ɓe fantintaa ɓe ɓittintaa kadi, [ɓe] woni ñiiɓuɓe hakkunde ɗum
E ɓen ɓe rewaali wonndude e Alla reweteeɗo goo, ɓe waraali fittaandu ki Alla harmini kin si wanaa sabu goonga, hara ɓe jeenataa. Mo waɗii ɗum o hawray e junuubu
Sowanoyte mo Lepte ɗen Ñalnde Darngal, o luttinoyee e nder majje ko o hoynaaɗo
Si wanaa ɓen tuubuɓe ɓe gomɗini ɓe golli golle moƴƴe, haray ɓen ɗon Allalomtinay bonɗi maɓɓe ɗin moƴƴi. Alla wonii ko O Surroowo Yurmeteeɗo
Kala tuubuɗo o golli ko moƴƴi haray pellet, kanko o ruttoto ka Alla ko o jaɓanaaɗo tuubuubuyee
E ɓen ɓe seeditotaako penaale ɗen si ɓe rewii ka rayrayti ɗin [wowletee] ɓe feƴƴay ko tedduɓe @Corrected
E ɓen tawɓe si ɓe waajoraama Aayeeje Joomi maɓɓe ɗen ɓe hippotaako e dow majje ko ɓe faaɗuɓe e wumuɓe
E ɓen wi'ooɓe: "Joomi amen, okku men immorde e sonnaaɓe amen e geɗalɓe amen ɓuuɓendan gite, waɗaa men wonannde hulooɓe Alla ɓen ñentinteeɓe
Ɓenɗon ɓe yoɓoyte huɓeere nden sabu ko ɓe muññii kon, ɓe hawroya nder ton e hiwraango e salminaango
Ko ɓe ñiiɓooɓe nder ton moƴƴii ñiiɓirde e darorde
Maaku: "Jeyɗo lam On haajaaka e mooɗon sinndo wanaano du'aaji mo'on ɗin, gomɗii on fenniino aray ɗe laatoo duumiiɗe [Lepte laakara]
